name: All
query:
MATCH (n)
OPTIONAL MATCH (n)-[r]-(m)
RETURN n, r, m

name: ACS
query:
MATCH (c: Created)
WHERE NOT (c)<-[:CONSUMES]-(:Exercised)
RETURN c

name: Filtrer by maxOffset
query:
MATCH (n)
WHERE n.offset <= $maxOffset
OPTIONAL MATCH (n)-[r]-(m)
WHERE m.offset <= $maxOffset OR m IS NULL
RETURN n, r, m

name: ACS template name counts
query:
MATCH (n: Created)
WHERE NOT (n)<-[:CONSUMES]-(:Exercised)
RETURN n.template_name AS template_name, count(*) AS count
ORDER BY count DESC

name: All template name counts
query:
MATCH (n: Created)
RETURN n.template_name AS template_name, count(*) AS count
ORDER BY count DESC

name: No Amulet, ValidatorLicense, ValidatorLivenessActivityRecord
query:
MATCH (n: Created)
WHERE n.template_name <> "Splice.Amulet.Amulet" AND n.template_name <> "Splice.ValidatorLicense.ValidatorLicense" AND n.template_name <> 
"Splice.ValidatorLicense.ValidatorLivenessActivityRecord"
OPTIONAL MATCH (n)-[r]-(e: Exercised)
RETURN n, r, e

name: Active Amulet
query:
MATCH (c: Created)
WHERE NOT (c)<-[:CONSUMES]-(:Exercised) AND c.template_name = "Splice.Amulet.Amulet"
RETURN c

name: Active Amulet context
query:
MATCH (a: Created)
WHERE a.template_name = "Splice.Amulet.Amulet" AND NOT (a)<-[:CONSUMES]-(:Exercised)
MATCH path = (a)-[*1..3]-(connected)
RETURN path

name: ACS min offset
query:
MATCH (n: Created)
WHERE NOT (n)<-[:CONSUMES]-(:Exercised)
RETURN min(n.offset) AS min_offset
